kreport.name: fbForecloseRate_sl

condition.name: deptId
condition.extend: select v_o.id,v_o.org_name from v_org v_o where v_o.type='分部' and v_o.area in(${s@user_areas}) order by v_o.type_order,v_o.org_order

condition.name: area
condition.extend: select d.dvalue,d.dname from sys_data_dictionary d where d.dgroup='区域' order by d.ordernum

data.tbody: ${0} ${1} ${2} ${3} ${4} ${5} ${6} ${7} ${8}

kreport.ksql: --首派工单清单 select distinct v_o.org_name 分部, f.serialno 工单编号, f.title 工单标题, to_char(f.gendate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') 报障时间, i.organiger 报障人, i.organigerdept 报障部门, rend(i.area) 区域, i.faultdescription 故障描述 from ( select f.flowlsh,n.nodelsh,n.nodecode,n.status,n.executergrouporgid,row_number() over (partition by f.flowlsh order by n.gendate) rn from rec_flow f,rec_node n ,ins_frm_fault i where f.flowlsh=i.flowlsh and f.flowlsh=n.flowlsh and f.status!='XJ' and n.nodecode in ( '8705e3d30a112268006ecb0498438858', --IT分部接口 '8706e7770a11226800104dac10cfa517', --业务支持中心接口 '8707d5ab0a112268006fa804cb1cbc30', --厂家处理 '5c0f45e30a112211013df5e327d23d55', --电子运维处理 '95e87c590a112268017f3be1d42c0688' --省IT中心科室处理 ) #[and f.startercode ${startercode}] #[and f.startercode=${type10000}] #[and i.area=${area}] #[and f.gendate>=${startDate}] #[and f.gendate<${endDate}] ) n,rec_flow f,ins_frm_fault i,v_org v_o where f.flowlsh=i.flowlsh and f.flowlsh=n.flowlsh and v_o.id=n.executergrouporgid and v_o.type='分部' and n.rn=1 and n.nodecode='8705e3d30a112268006ecb0498438858' --IT分部接口 #[and v_o.org_name=${org_name}] #[and n.status in ('DB','DT') --${dt}] #[and n.status in ('TH','SH') --${th}] #[and v_o.id=${deptId}] #[and v_o.area in(${s@user_areas})]
